summary: Eight people try to end their loneliness by searching for that one person to love, who can make their life complete.
cast: Qi Shu|Mark Chao|Wei Zhao|Amber Kuo|Ivy Yi-Han Chen|Ethan Juan|Eddie Peng|Doze Niu|Han Dian Chen|David Te-Yang Chiu|Ralf Chiu|Hsiao-Yeh|Chin-Jung Kang|Stephanie Shu-Yan Lee|Hsuan Li|Grace Wen-Yi Lin|Jim Liu|Shao-hua Lung|Hsueh-Liang Pu|Chiang Ting|Emily Tsai|Jingchun Wang|Kuei-Mei Yang|Ray Yang|Belle Yu
director: Director: Doze Niu (as Doze Niu Chen-Zer)
title: Ai
